attributes.long-description: The Adventures of Cookie and Cream is a 3D platformer that can be played as a single- or multiplayer game. Players must guide the two cartoonish, bunny-like characters (Cookie and Cream) through parallel courses that usually scroll from the top of the screen.As the characters run side by side up their individual tracks, they often come to obstacles that block the path for one or both of them. In cooperative games, the character on one side can help clear the obstacle for his partner by manipulating objects on his or her side of the screen.The Adventures of Cookie and Cream is designed to be an immediate, lighthearted title suitable for casual gaming and multiplayer parties. ©2000, 2001 From Software, Inc. From Software and the From Software Logo are trademarks of From Software, Inc. All rights reserved. Agetec and the Agetec logo, The Adventure of Cookie and Cream and The Adventure of Cookie and Cream logo are trademarks of Agetec, Inc.  This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. This title has been converted from the original PlayStation®2 version to the PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation®2 peripherals, therefore some functionalities may not be available.
attributes.name: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream (PS2 Classic)
